channel.title: San Diego Sports: A Chargers Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: By Dan McLellan
channel.itunes:author: Dan McLellan

item.title: Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 May 13, 2012
item.description: Guests on Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 May 13, 2012 included: Bruce Laird, a former safety for the Colts and Chargers and president and chairman of the 4th and Goal Board of Directors helping retired players and, Clark Judge an NFL beat writer for CBSsports.com. Topics Included: A Celebration of Life for Junior Seau, Where does the NFL go from here, and How to improve retired players benefits.
item.dc:creator: Dan McLellan
item.itunes:summary: Guests on Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 May 13, 2012 included: Bruce Laird, a former safety for the Colts and Chargers and president and chairman of the 4th and Goal Board of Directors helping retired players and, Clark Judge an NFL beat writer for CBSsports.com. Topics Included: A Celebration of Life for Junior Seau, Where does the NFL go from here, and How to improve retired players benefits.

item.title: Junior Seau Tribute: Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 May 6, 2012
item.description: Guests on Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 May 6, 2012 included: Sports Illustrated writer Peter King and NFL Hall of Fame guard Joe DeLamielleure. The show's topic: This show was entirely dedicated to the death of former Chargers LB Junior Seau from a self-inflicted gunshot wound to the chest and how his death will impact the NFL. DeLamielleure is an outspoken leader for improving retirees benefits.
item.dc:creator: Dan McLellan

item.title: Chargers Draft Recap: Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 April 29, 2012
item.description: Guests on Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 April 29, 2012 included: Chargers new TE Ladarius Green (round 4, 110th overall pick. The show's topic: A recap of the Chargers 2012 NFL Draft selections.
item.dc:creator: Dan McLellan
item.itunes:summary: Guests on Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 April 29, 2012 included: Chargers new TE Ladarius Green (round 4, 110th overall pick. The show's topic: A recap of the Chargers 2012 NFL Draft selections.

item.title: Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 April 22, 2012
item.description: Guests on Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 April 22, 2012 included: San Diego Sea Lions’ G.M. Amie Becker, head Coach, Jen Lalor-Nielsen along with team captains Sarah Aguilar and Danica Carey were in studio. SDSU OLB and NFL draft prospect Miles Burris called in for the final segment. The shows topics included: Padres, Chargers, Sea Lions, NFL Draft, Sea Lions and Burris’s chances on being drafted.
item.dc:creator: Dan McLellan

item.title: Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 April 15, 2012
item.description: Guests on Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 April 15, 2012 included: Michael Marckx, the CEO of Spy Optics, SDSU All-American punter and NFL prospect Brian Stahovich and Jim Smiley a Dodgers beat writer for the Examiner. The shows topics included: Padres, Dodgers, Chargers, NFL Draft, Stahovich on punting, and Cycling (Belgian Waffle Race). Photo courtesy of the Belgian Waffle Race
item.dc:creator: Dan McLellan

item.title: Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 April 8, 2012
item.description: Guests on Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 April 8, 2012 included: Golf writer Don Wade, San Diego Padres guru Bob Chandler and Clent Alexander, the CEO/President of the San Diego Flash. The shows topics included: Dan’s rant on why he believes the Padres could lose 100 games, Don Wade’s insight on the Masters, Bob Chandler’s insight on the Padres, and Clint Alexander talks about the state of outdoor soccer in San Diego. Photo for Podcast courtesy of the San Diego Flash.
item.dc:creator: Dan McLellan

item.title: Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 April 5, 2012
item.description: Sports Squawk filed in drive time (4:00-7:00 PM) on Xtra Sports 1360 for Thursday April 5. Guests included: Ben Levenson, CEO and co-founder of Origins Recovery Centers and Ted Tryba of the Golf Channel. Topics included, Greg Williams bounty scandal, Padres TV coverage, Chargers signings, Ryan Leaf arrest and the Masters golf tournament. Note: Commercials have been removed for your listening pleasure.
item.dc:creator: Dan McLellan

item.title: Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 April 1, 2012
item.description: Guests on Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 March 1, 2012 included: San Diego Derby Dolls; Kupcake Kaboom, Psycho Brahe, and Bam Bam McGee and NFL draft prospect QB Chris Forcier, a St. Augustine alum. The shows topics included: Dan’s rant about Ryan Leaf being arrested again, the Derby Dolls and Chris Forcier’s draft expectations. Note: For the exception of our title sponsor Herca Solar, all commercials have been removed for your listening pleasure.
item.dc:creator: Dan McLellan

The shows topics included: Dan’s rant about Ryan Leaf being arrested again, the Derby Dolls and Chris Forcier’s draft expectations. Note: For the exception of our title sponsor Herca Solar, all commercials have been removed for your listening pleasure.

item.title: Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 March 29, 2012
item.description: Sports Squawk filed in drive time (4:00-7:00 PM) on Xtra Sports 1360 for Thursday March 29. Guests included: Chargers players QB Philip Rivers and TE Kory Sperry, Padres pitcher Casey Kelley, Jim Laslavic of NBC San Diego, Jay Paris of the North County Times, Mark Grant color analysis for the Padres, Annie Heilbrunn of San Diego Union-Tribune and Hank Bauer color analysis for the Chargers. Topics included: New Chargers downtown stadium update, NFL Rules changes, Rivers of Hope Foundation and all of the latest Chargers and Padres news. Commercials for this three-hour show have been removed for your listening pleasure. Note: The beginning of the Casey Kelley interview was accidentally lost.
item.dc:creator: Dan McLellan

Topics included: New Chargers downtown stadium update, NFL Rules changes, Rivers of Hope Foundation and all of the latest Chargers and Padres news. Commercials for this three-hour show have been removed for your listening pleasure. Note: The beginning of the Casey Kelley interview was accidentally lost.

item.title: Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 March 25, 2012
item.description: Guests on Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 March 25, 2012 included: Larry Holder, the Saints RapidReporter and columnist for CBSsports.com and co-host of the Sport Hangover on 690 WIST am out of New Orleans, Lisa Zimmerman the Jets Rapid Reporter, and Stacy Jolna, the CMO and co-founder of ConnectTV. The shows topics included: The Saints bounty scandal, the trade of Tim Tebow to the Jets, ConnectTV, a hot new app that combines television and social media, along with Chargers and Padres talk.
item.dc:creator: Dan McLellan

The shows topics included: The Saints bounty scandal, the trade of Tim Tebow to the Jets, ConnectTV, a hot new app that combines television and social media, along with Chargers and Padres talk.

item.title: Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 March 18, 2012
item.description: Guests on Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 for March 19 2012,included San Diego NFL prospect NT Nathan Chandler, an alum of Mira Mesa High School and UCLA. Writers Clark Judge of CBSSports.com and Chargers beat writer Michael Gehlken of the San Diego Union-Tribune. We talked about all of the San Diego Chargers free agency moves, where Peyton Manning will land, and the San Diego Sockers completing a perfect 24-0 2011-12 campaign by winning the U.S. Open Cup on March 17, 2012.
item.dc:creator: Dan McLellan

item.title: Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 March 11, 2012
item.description: Sports Squawk Sunday with Doug and Dan on Xtra Sports 1360 guests: Gil Sperry author of "Soccer's Story & a Futbol Fable," with Rosy Torres, Mexico's only racquetball World Champion. San Diego Union Tribune writer Don Norcross discusses SDSU Aztec men’s Basketball and Padres baseball. San Diego Sockers GM John Kentera talks about the Sockers third straight PASL championship.

item.title: Episode 74 The Chargers RapidReport Recap Show Week 17 of 2011 vs Raiders
item.description: Dan McLellan, the Chargers Rapid Reporter for CBSSports.com, breaks down the top-three rapid reports of the week to give you three things to look for going into each game. This week the Chargers (7-8) travel to take on the Raiders (8-7). The Chargers are eliminated from the playoffs and can do the same to the Raiders by betting their rivals on the final game of the season.

item.title: Episode 73 The Chargers RapidReport Recap Show Week 16 of 2011 vs. Lions
item.description: Dan McLellan, the Chargers Rapid Reporter for CBSSports.com, breaks down the top-three rapid reports of the week to give you three things to look for going into each game. This week the Chargers (7-7) host the Ravens (9-5). The Chargers need to win to keep their playoff hopes alive, while the Lions can clinch a playoff spot with a victory.

item.title: Episode 72 The Chargers RapidReport Recap Show Week 15 of 2011 vs Ravens
item.description: Dan McLellan, the Chargers Rapid Reporter for CBSSports.com, breaks down the top-three rapid reports of the week to give you three things to look for going into each game. This week the Chargers (6-7) host the Ravens (10-3). The Chargers need to win to keep their playoff hopes alive, while the Ravens can clinch a playoff spot with a victory.
